panels.description: Total number of parsed events for this event lane stored in Elasticsearch.
panels.title: Parsed events in Elasticsearch

panels.description: Total number of unparsed events for this event lane stored in Elasticsearch.
panels.title: Unparsed events in Elasticsearch

panels.description: Size of all Elasticsearch event lane indices.
panels.title: Elasticsearch Storage Size

targets.query: SELECT count("container_id") FROM "docker_container_status" WHERE ("instance_id"::tag =~ /^lmio-parsec-${tenant}-${eventlane:text}.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Size of incoming events in bytes per second.
panels.title: BYTES IN

panels.description: Number of events that were not parsed per second.
panels.title: EPS DROP

panels.description: Number of non-consumed messages on RECEIVED topic per partition.
panels.title: Total Lag on RECEIVED topic per partition

panels.description: Number of incoming messages to EVENTS topic per partition.
panels.title: Messages Per Minute Per Partition

panels.description: Number of events that were not parsed per second.
panels.title: EPS DROP

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lmio.eventlane.event" WITH KEY = "tenant"
list.name: tenant
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lmio.eventlane.event" WITH KEY = "tenant"

list.definition: show tag values from  "bspump.pipeline.dutycycle"  with key="instance_id"  WHERE value =~ /lmio-parsec-$tenant-${eventlane:text}.*/
list.name: instances
list.query: show tag values from  "bspump.pipeline.dutycycle"  with key="instance_id"  WHERE value =~ /lmio-parsec-$tenant-${eventlane:text}.*/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lmio.eventlane.event" WITH KEY = "eventlane" WHERE "tenant" =~ /^$tenant$/
list.name: eventlane
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lmio.eventlane.event" WITH KEY = "eventlane" WHERE "tenant" =~ /^$tenant$/
